name: pocketsquire-arena
description: A simple roguelike boss-rush game in Unity

scripts.task:start: bd config set current_bead $(bd create --silent --type task --priority 2)
scripts.task:submit: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && gh pr create --fill && bd close $(bd config get current_bead) && bd config unset current_bead && bd sync
